name: clear-site-data
description: A sleek Chrome extension that allows users to selectively clear site data for the current tab. Features a modern Vercel-inspired UI with dark mode support, customizable data clearing options, and user preference saving.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json popup.html popup.js popup.css dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.zip: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../clear-site-data.zip *
